Name: Hexlide
About the game: Hexlide is a chilled and relaxing minimalist puzzle game with beautiful music. Slide rows of hexagons to match a pattern, very much like a 2D hexagonal magic cube. If you enjoy games such as Rubik's Cube Â® you'll love Hexlide, which provides a simpler, more intuitive interface, alongside a great soundtrack for TOTAL relaxation. The game offers 36 levels to enjoy as well as built-in support for Steam Leaderboards , which should provide a few hours of entertainment!
